TEXT.TITLE: ALLIS-CHALMERS <AH> SELLS SWISS UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Allis-Chalmers Corp said it has sold its Elex Ag unit in Zurich, Switzerland, to private investors for an undisclosed amount. The company said Elex produces electrostatic precipitators used in air pollution control. Reuter
